At Yeager & Boyd, we strive to be one of the most respected accounting firms nationwide. Our team of professionals are committed to exceeding expectations and providing exceptional tax, audit and forensic services. We provide a great place to work where our employees are inspired to be the best they can be.  Now in our fourth decade of service, we pride ourselves on staying up-to-date on the latest audit and reporting requirements, tax planning strategies, compliance procedures, public housing authority audits  and forensic accounting services.  Our services include: • Year-round local income tax planning  • Audit services  • Retirement planning  • Financial statement preparation  • Litigation support  • Bookkeeping for personal or business  • Financial estate and retirement planning  • Financial projections  • IRS representation  • Business valuations  • Public Housing Authority audits   Our Certified Public Accounting firm specializes in Public Housing Authority audits throughout the United States with all audits performed having received the required HUD approvals. We’ve built a highly specialized team of auditors and support staff to confidently meet your needs.
